Package projectmanager

Class Person

java.lang.Object
projectmanager.Person
public class Person
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines a Person, and contains methods to manipulate Persons stored in a Map.

It is used by ProjectManager.

Changes from V2.0: Methods selectPerson and updatePerson moved here from ProjectManager. Method populatePersonsMap added.

Changes from V2.1: Method mapToList added. Class no longer implements Serializable.

Version:
V3.0 August 2021
Author:
J.E. Foster Â©

  • Constructor Details

    • Person

      public Person​(java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String cellNum, java.lang.String emailAddress, java.lang.String physAddress, java.lang.String type)
      Creates a Person.
      Parameters:
      type - a String containing person type (either "Architect", "Contractor", "Customer", "Structural Engineer", or "Project Manager")
      surname - a String containing the person's surname
      name - a String containing the person's first name
      cellNum - a String containing the person's cell number
      emailAddress - a String containing the person's email address
      physAddress - a String containing the person's residential address

    • populatePersonsMap

      public static void populatePersonsMap​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> personinfo, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Person> map)
      Creates new Person and adds it to a Map.
      Parameters:
      personinfo - a List containing person info Strings.
      map - a Map with String keys and Person values
      Since:

    • mapToList

      public static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> mapToList​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Person> map)
      Iterates through a Map containing Persons, adds each Person - as List of String attributes - to a corresponding List of Lists (representing type), then adds all these Lists to a List of Lists of Lists (representing all types), which is returned.
      Parameters:
      map - a Map with String keys and Person values
      Returns:
      a List of Lists of Lists containing Person attribute Strings.
      Since:
      V3.0

    • selectPerson

      public static Person selectPerson​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Person> map)
      Iterates through a Map containing Persons, selects a parameter-specified Person, then displays and returns the selected Person.
      Parameters:
      name - a String containing the name and/or surname of a Person
      map - a Map containing Persons.
      Returns:
      the selected Person object (null if no project found)
      Since:
      V1

    • updatePerson

      public void updatePerson​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> personInfo)
      Updates the personal-detail attributes (cellNum, emailAddress, and physAddress) of any Person.

      This method validates user input via ProjectManager.checkUserInput. It allows the user to update cell number, email address, and physical address. If left blank, the attributes remain unchanged. The altered Person replaces the corresponding Person in the Map. The Person is then read from the Map and displayed.

      Parameters:
      personInfo - a List containing new Person attribute Strings.
      Since:
      V1
